entry.title: Shareaholic Related Post Plugin For Hexo
entry.content:
Assalamualaikum,

After reading article in any blog we are searching new content and in many blog Related Post or You May Also Like is present for providing a quick access for related article to user and this is generating more page view for any blog or website which is definitely increases ranking and generate more income. My previous tutorial teach you how to insert Shareaholic Related Post Plugin in Octopress Blog. In this tutorial you learn how to insert Shareaholic Related Post Plugin in Hexo Blog using Shareaholic Recommendations.This is very simple and easy tutorial so follow and enjoy a related post functionality in your hexo blog, any problem i am ready to help you.

Steps For Adding Shareaholic Recommendations in Hexo

Note: I am Using a Landscape Theme And this Tutorial is tested on it.

1. Go to Shareaholic website and signup.

2. For adding Recommendations in octopress click on this link.

3. Fillup all necessary data,then click on save settings.After click on it shows a java code to paste in your website copy all code.

4. Go to Themes\landscape\layout directory of your blog.

5. Open _partial\head.ejs and paste this code in above a </head>

Note: Please replace this apikey with your api key.var apikey = '6a26e924868f7c2b4e4da9f6138494a0'

6.Open _partial\article.ejs and place this code below a <footer class="article-footer"> which is present in line 21.

7.Enjoy.

Demo Image:

Any Difficulties, Feel Free to Ask.

Assalamualaikum,

After reading article in any blog we are searching new content and in many blog Related Post or You May Also Like is present for providing a quick access for related article to user and this is generating more page view for any blog or website which is definitely increases ranking and generate more income. My previous tutorial teach you how to insert Shareaholic Related Post Plugin in Octopress Blog. In this tutorial you learn how to insert Shareaholic Related Post Plugin in Hexo Blog using Shareaholic Recommendations.This is very simple and easy tutorial so follow and enjoy a related post functionality in your hexo blog, any problem i am ready to help you.

entry.title: Why I Switch My Blog From Octopress To Hexo
entry.content:
Assalamualaikum,

When i start my first personal blog i am totally unaware about how to create a blog and how to maintain it. But internet and Google is always your best friend for making any thing in Awesome manner. I use Blogspot first, its a simple and easy platform but i want something extra so decide to use wordpress. Wordpress is world largest platform for hosting your blog or you install it on your server, but its also include a many feature which is not require in my blog so i think to switch to new blogging engine which is Octopress. But using it i realize its generation speed is very slow. Now my hunt is on for faster and Octopress like generation software i found a New And Better alternative of Octopress Which is called Hexo.

Why I Switch My Blog From Octopress to Hexo

Octopress is very good platform and its tag line is attract me to start my blog using Octopress.

A blogging framework for hackers.

Its very user friendly but when you are generating a website its takes too much time, i have only 24 articles but its takes 2-3 minutes for generating entire website. so i decide to switch my blog to any other blogging software which is similar to Octopress and my main criteria for choosing any blogging software is speed of generation. After lot of googling i found a Hexo which is similar to Octopress but its takes only 2-3 second which is very fast as compared to Octopress. When switching any platform for website its takes lot of headache and hard work for converting website or blog from one software markup to another, but in my case nothing to change in my article and code simply copy previous articles markdown files to Hexo directory. Running generation command and my blog works again.

Thanks Hexo for saving my time.....
entry.summary:
Assalamualaikum,

When i start my first personal blog i am totally unaware about how to create a blog and how to maintain it. But internet and Google is always your best friend for making any thing in Awesome manner. I use Blogspot first, its a simple and easy platform but i want something extra so decide to use wordpress. Wordpress is world largest platform for hosting your blog or you install it on your server, but its also include a many feature which is not require in my blog so i think to switch to new blogging engine which is Octopress. But using it i realize its generation speed is very slow. Now my hunt is on for faster and Octopress like generation software i found a New And Better alternative of Octopress Which is called Hexo.

entry.title: How to Design Circuit Layouts
entry.content:
Designing a Circuit Diagram is easy but designing a Circuit Layout is difficult Task.Generally students like us prefer manual method for designing layout in which circuit layout is drawn on paper and then mirror image of the same is drawn on the PCB using permanent marker.Design circuit layouts using software is difficult but we can’t escape our self when we are talking about a big project consisting of numerous components.In such cases preparing layout using manual method is tedious venture.

For our final year degree project we tried to make layout using traditional manual method but,we found it difficult to make a layout for forty pin IC on the PCB.Then we decided to go for software method.No one among us was familiar about the software method.Initially we faced lots of difficulty, then finally we came out with shortcut method of designing layout using “EAGLE SOFTWARE” along with some additional softwares.

We are starting a series for electronics students.you can check below,

Circuit Layout Designing

Part2: Comming Soon

The software required for the same is enlisted below.

For Designing a Circuit Layout We are Using Eagle as a Layout Maker.

Eagle:

Eagle offers user friendly, powerful and affordable solutions for PCB design, including Schematic Capture, Board Layout and Autorouter. User Language Programs enable features such as simulation and 3D-visualization.

Note:Making Layout for project free version of Eagle is sufficient.

Download From Here: Download Eagle.

Screen Capture Tools:

We are trying to give you a shortest way for making layout.For this purpose use FastStone as Image Capture Software,You can use any image capturing software for this purpose.

Download FastStone From Here: Download FastStone.

Note: FastStone Capture is not a free program so instead of using FastStone Capture.

Windows7 User use a Snipping Tool which is present in Start→All Programs→Accessories→Snipping Tool

Use Greenshot which is a Free Software which is equivalent to FastStone.

Download Greenshot From Here: Download Greenshot.

Microsoft Word:

This is a last and final software.Microsoft Word is used for print preview. Insha-allah In next part of this tutorial we will show you how to use this softwares for making perfect layout for your projects.
entry.summary: Designing a Circuit Diagram is easy but designing a Circuit Layout is difficult Task.Generally students like us prefer manual method for designing layout in which circuit layout is drawn on paper and then mirror image of the same is drawn on the PCB using permanent marker.Design circuit layouts using software is difficult but we can’t escape our self when we are talking about a big project consisting of numerous components.In such cases preparing layout using manual method is tedious venture.

entry.title: Deobfuscate Or UnHide jQuery Source Code
entry.content:
Assalamualaikum

Downloading blogger template from free template provider? After installing these free template you see many links in your website which is harm your website ranking and also hit by Google Panda.If these links present in template then you can easily find it but if these links are encoded into java script then its unable to find.

How To Find Links Or Code Present In Encoded jQuery Code

In any free template if you find any jQuery or JavaScript in numerical form or unable to understand then this tutorial is very usefull for you.

entry.title: Shareaholic Related Post Plugin For Octopress
entry.content:
Assalamualaikum

Related Post or You may also like: in a website increase reader engagement by highlighting related content from across your site and also decrease the bounce rate.In octopress many hacks and plugin present for adding related post content in blog like Facebook Related Post Plugin for Octopress Blog .In this tutorial i teach you how to add simplest related post plugin in octopress blog using Shareaholic Recommendations.

How to add Shareaholic Recommendations in octopress

1. Go to Shareaholic website and signup.

2. For adding Recommendations in octopress click on this link.

3. Fillup all necessary data,then click on save settings.After click on it shows a java code to paste in your website copy all code.

4. Go to source directory of your blog.

5. Open _includes\head.html and paste this code in above a </head>

Note: Please replace this apikey with your api key.var apikey = '6a26e924868f7c2b4e4da9f6138494a0'

6.Open _layout\post.html and place this code below a endunless which is present in line 16.

7.Enjoy.

From Author Desk:

This is a very great service because once you install code in website and make any changes in shareaholic account your website is automatically update with recent change.No need to update code again.
entry.summary:
Assalamualaikum

Related Post or You may also like: in a website increase reader engagement by highlighting related content from across your site and also decrease the bounce rate.In octopress many hacks and plugin present for adding related post content in blog like Facebook Related Post Plugin for Octopress Blog .In this tutorial i teach you how to add simplest related post plugin in octopress blog using Shareaholic Recommendations.

entry.title: How to Remove Octopress Post Date Stamp from Google SERPS
entry.content:
Assalamualaikum,

Every Octopress blog theme shows a date for publish post and its very helpfull for readers.Date in post tells readers when post was publish and make them happy but it can be disruptive to the appearance of your content is Google’s SERPS.Google Panda Update showing dates of blog post in SERP Description and its mostly happen for Older blog.Old dates in your blog post decrease CTR of post,so you lost your ranking in world and you lost against your Competitor.

For example,if you search for Setup Octopress In Windows you see results dated with 2011,2012 and 2013.You are ignore first two dated result and click on result which have a lattest date.Think if result is withuot any date its take advantage of doubt and obiviously get more click compare to 2011 and 2012

Let see below result for same search queries.

In Above example,clicks battle between post with no date or post dated with Apr 6, 2012.Which result you like to click?

How to Remove Date Stamps from Google SERPS Description

Wordpress have a plugin for this purpose but what about octopress?

Simply Download This Code and follow all steps for remove Date Stamps from Google SERPS Description.

Note: Please Backup your file before any change.

From Author Desk:

Personally,I dislike the idea of removing date from posts,b ecause its give a bad impact on user but to beat Google Panda Update,its become necessary.
entry.summary:
Assalamualaikum,

Every Octopress blog theme shows a date for publish post and its very helpfull for readers.Date in post tells readers when post was publish and make them happy but it can be disruptive to the appearance of your content is Google’s SERPS.Google Panda Update showing dates of blog post in SERP Description and its mostly happen for Older blog.Old dates in your blog post decrease CTR of post,so you lost your ranking in world and you lost against your Competitor.

entry.title: Author Review Plugin For Octopress
entry.content:
Assalamualaikum,

Octopress is beautiful framework for start a serious blogging.Its new in market but accepted by many pro blogger for choose as a blogging software.Many Blogger's move to octopress from wordpress for octopress simplicity,but not so many hacks or plugin available for octopress.In this tutorial i talk about a Author Review Plugin which is present in wordpress[Author hReview],Its a very important plugin if you review any Product.Below i share a code for adding this beautiful plugin in Octopress Blog.

Check It:Author Review Widget for Blogger

Steps For Adding Author Review Plugin In Octopress

1.Make New Post.

2.Now copy below code And Change according your review and paste it.

Note:

  • Change Author Review Plugin For Octopress With Your Review Name.
  • Change March 19 2013 and 2013-03-19 with your Date.
  • Change 5 with your Rating

5.Now publish your review and enjoy.

Check Image Demo Here:

Google Search Result Page:Author Review Plugin Demo In Google Search Page

Note:

  • No guarantee about Google catch your post as a review.
  • Please paste code Below a <!--more--> if you post above it google cosider whole home page as a review.
  • This plugin supports only the editorial ratings submission (edito/author rating), this means customers and site visitors are not involved in the rating or review process, this means rating reflects only the author's opinion.
Author Review Plugin For Octopress
 Reviewed by Shaikh Masood Alam on March 19 2013
Rating: 5
entry.summary:
Assalamualaikum,

Octopress is beautiful framework for start a serious blogging.Its new in market but accepted by many pro blogger for choose as a blogging software.Many Blogger's move to octopress from wordpress for octopress simplicity,but not so many hacks or plugin available for octopress.In this tutorial i talk about a Author Review Plugin which is present in wordpress[Author hReview],Its a very important plugin if you review any Product.Below i share a code for adding this beautiful plugin in Octopress Blog.

entry.title: Author Review Widget For Blogger
entry.content:
Assalamualaikum,

Whenever You Search Google for any product, you find a star rating in Google search pages.This is review which is written by someone about product which you want.For Wordpress User its easy to impliment this becasue for this purpose wordpress have a plugin[Author hReview].But if you not use a wordpress platform and using a blogger,then its difficult task to impliment such type of plugin.In Below tutorial i share a simple code to impliment such Beautiful plugin in Blogger.

Steps For Adding Author Review Widget In Blogger

1.Go to Blogger Dashbord.

2.Make New Post.

3.After Writing your review switch to HTML mode.

4.Now copy below code And Change according your review and paste it.

Note:

  • Change Author Review Widget For Blogger With Your Review Name.
  • Change March 19 2013 and 2013-03-19 with your Date.
  • Change 5 with your Rating

5.Now publish your review and enjoy.

Check Image Demo Here:

Google Search Result Page:Author Review Demo In Google Search Page

Note:

  • No guarantee about Google catch your post as a review.
  • Please paste code Below a <!--more--> if you post above it google cosider whole home page as a review.
  • This widget supports only the editorial ratings submission (edito/author rating), this means customers and site visitors are not involved in the rating or review process, this means rating reflects only the author's opinion.
Author Review Widget For Blogger
 Reviewed by Shaikh Masood Alam on March 19 2013
Rating: 5

entry.title: LinkWithin Style Related Post Blogger Widget
entry.content:
Assalamualaikum,

Related Post or You Might Also Like This Widget Or Plugin help reader of your blog to find a some related and intresting content of your Blog.Its also help to reduce bounce rate of your blog and also this is help to increase your Page Views.Displaying a Related Post is a way to keep your site visitors around.Adding Related Post Widget In Blogger is easy and any one do this.

Check Some Intresting Tutorials Here:

  • Add CSS Optimizer Script in Blogger Blogspot
  • Add Instant Page Rank Checker Tool in Blogger Blog
  • Add Character Counter Tool in Your Blogger Blog
  • Add Adsense Code Parser or HTML Encoder in Your Blogger Blog

Steps For Adding Related Post Widget In Blogger

1.Go to Blogger Dashbord.

2.Go to Template Section.

3.Click on Edit HTML and Tick on Expand Widget Templates.

4.Search (CTRL + F) for this piece of code:</head>

5.Copy and paste the below code just before/above </head>

Note:

  • To change the default picture, replace the URL in Line 20 with your own URL.
  • For displaying more than 4 posts, replace 4 value from var maxresults=4; in Line 21.
  • Remove the Line 1 and Line 27 if you want the related posts to be displayed in homepage too.

6.Now find the following code: <div class='post-footer'>

7.Just above it, copy and paste the below code:

Note:

  • Change the 5 value from max-results=5 with the number of posts you want to be displayed.
  • If you want the related posts to be displayed on homepage too, remove the Line 1 and Line 12.

8.Save the Template and Enjoy.

This widget Inspired By My Blogger Tricks.

LinkWithin Style Related Post Blogger Widget
 Reviewed by Shaikh Masood Alam on March 17 2013
Rating: 5
entry.summary:
Assalamualaikum,

Related Post or You Might Also Like This Widget Or Plugin help reader of your blog to find a some related and intresting content of your Blog.Its also help to reduce bounce rate of your blog and also this is help to increase your Page Views.Displaying a Related Post is a way to keep your site visitors around.Adding Related Post Widget In Blogger is easy and any one do this.

entry.title: Add CSS Optimizer Script In Blogger Blogspot
entry.content:
Assalamualaikum,

Optimization of css code in any website is important.Its necessary because its help you to reduce your website loading time which is important in Google SEO.Google more prefer a website which is load fast,For this many technique are used and Compressing CSS Code is one technique.For This i show you how to add in Your Blogger Blog.

Check Some Intresting Tutorials Here:

  • Add CSS Color Chart In Blogger Blog
  • Add Instant Page Rank Checker Tool in Blogger Blog
  • Add Character Counter Tool in Your Blogger Blog
  • Add Adsense Code Parser or HTML Encoder in Your Blogger Blog

Features Of This Tool:

  • Remove the white space (tabs, spaces, carriage returns) abundant, including white spaces before and after the colon (:), semicolon (;)
  • Remove the semicolon character (;) the last brackets (})
  • Open the HTML color code into the form of short (from # ffffff to # fff)
  • Open the CSS code for margin and padding (as margin: 5px 0px 5px 0px margin: 5px 0). Support both 3 Short.

Tutorial:

1.Create a Page

2.Paste Below Code in Your Page.

3.Go to Blogger Dashbord.

4.Go to Template Section.

5.Click on Edit HTML and Tick on Expand Widget Templates.

6.Add below javascript code before </head>

Optimization of css code in any website is important.Its necessary because its help you to reduce your website loading time which is important in Google SEO.Google more prefer a website which is load fast,For this many technique are used and Compressing CSS Code is one technique.For This i show you how to add in Your Blogger Blog.

entry.title: Facebook Related Post Plugin For Octopress Blog
entry.content:
Assalamualaikum

After Trying Many Related Post Plugin for Octopress Blog i Discover this plugin for octopress and this plugin uses facebook apps.Using this plugin post which related by your current post is displayed by facebook.So you can engage your visitor more socially.Its open in left or right corner of user screen with hiding button and like button.User can easily like your content.For checking demo you can see any post of my website.

Tutorial

1.Go to Facebook Developers.

2.Click On Apps Button.

3.If its your first app then its directly open or click on .

4.A new box open where you can fill only your desired name and click continue.

5.After above step a new page open.In Website with Facebook Login Box simply Enter your Octopress Blog Address And click Ok.Dont click on any Extra Button Or Fill any Boxes and copy App Id and keep it.

6.Go to Your Octopress Source > _includes

7.Open head.html and At Line 4 see <head> replace it with <head xmlns:fb="http://ogp.me/ns/fb#">

8.Open facebook_like.html.At Line 7 you see js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/en_US/all.js#appId=212934732101925&xfbml=1"; replace it with js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/en_US/all.js#appId=Your App Id&xfbml=1";

Replace Your App Id With your app id whic is copy in 5th step.

9.Open article.html and after <div class="entry-content">{{ content }}</div> Add Below Code.

Replace http://www.techelex.org With Your Site Name.Set right or left side="right".

Generate your Blog And Deploy It.See Demo At your Own Blog.
entry.summary:
Assalamualaikum

After Trying Many Related Post Plugin for Octopress Blog i Discover this plugin for octopress and this plugin uses facebook apps.Using this plugin post which related by your current post is displayed by facebook.So you can engage your visitor more socially.Its open in left or right corner of user screen with hiding button and like button.User can easily like your content.For checking demo you can see any post of my website.

entry.title: Free Webhost For Your Blog [Part2]
entry.content:
Asslamualaikum

In my previous post i show two good free host which is used by many website owners.In this article i show a some website which is not used as a webhost traditionally but many website owners used them as a webhost and those site also provide a good uptime as compared to any free webhost.This site actually used as a code hosting like a Github.But problem is you can host only static website and they not allow any dynamic website but you can add any functionallity to static website using java script.Simple Tutorial Blog is also host in a github repository.you can Check source here or read this tutorial for setup your own octopress blog.

For using This You Can Use Only Static Website Generator.Check Some Generators Here

Github

Github is my personal favorite.Github is used for code hosting but you can use it for hosting static website and static blog.www.techelex.org is also host on github using octopress as a blogging software.

Bitbucket

Bitbucket is used mainly for hosting a source code but you can use it to host your static website.Its like a github so you can use either github or bitbucket.

You Can Run Dynamic Website or Static Website Using Below Website's.

Google App Engine

Google App Engine is used for running your application in google infrastructure.so you can setup a static website with it.Using This You can also run a Dynamic website.Check here a tutorial by Mr.Amit Agarwal For Setup Own Web Proxy Using Google App Engine.

AppFog

Appfog is Cloud PaaS platform.Where you found php,mysql and may other applications.Which is sufficient for hosting a dynamic website like a wordpress.Check This Tutorial For Installing Wordpress in Appfog.

Heroku

Heroku is a cloud application platform and support ruby,java,python etc.you can use it for host static or dynamic website.its work using a git system.its a very good platform and recomended by facebook applicatin.
entry.summary:
Asslamualaikum

In my previous post i show two good free host which is used by many website owners.In this article i show a some website which is not used as a webhost traditionally but many website owners used them as a webhost and those site also provide a good uptime as compared to any free webhost.This site actually used as a code hosting like a Github.But problem is you can host only static website and they not allow any dynamic website but you can add any functionallity to static website using java script.Simple Tutorial Blog is also host in a github repository.you can Check source here or read this tutorial for setup your own octopress blog.

entry.title: Free Webhost For Your Blog
entry.content:
Asslamualaikum

Blogging Is a Joyfull Work.Many blogger which is start blogging choose Blogspot as a blogging software like me.When i start blogging in mid of 2010 i choose a blogger as a software,but i use blogger for electronics website because we dont have enough money to buy a good wordpress webhost.After a googling i found a blogger is a best blogging software but many Pro blogger Like a Amit Agarwal choose a wordpress over a blogger.For starting a website using wordpress we want a good webhost and if you dont have enough money or trying to setup a just dummy or test wordpress website a free webhost is a good option.

In This Electronics World many Free Webhost are present but 99% webhost not provided a good up time so its affecting your site rank,losing your visitor and lose in your revenue.Below i mention some good webhost which is used by me and uptime is also great.

Byet Host

Byet host is First in my ranking and i also used since 2010.Its provide many good feature like a mysql database,50gb data traffic and many more Without any Ads.

Some Key Features:

  • 1000 MB (one gigabyte!) Disk Space
  • FTP account and File Manager
  • Control Panel
  • MySQL databases & PHP Support
  • Addon domain, Parked Domains, Sub-Domains
  • No ads!

Go:Signup For Free Hosting

Host1Free

Host1free is run by a Host1Plus and having many good features over Byet Host but some time its run little bit slow.

Some Key Features:

  • 2GB Disk Space
  • 10GB Bandwidth
  • 5 Domain Names
  • 2 MySQL Databases

Go:Signup For Free Hosting

Asslamualaikum

Blogging Is a Joyfull Work.Many blogger which is start blogging choose Blogspot as a blogging software like me.When i start blogging in mid of 2010 i choose a blogger as a software,but i use blogger for electronics website because we dont have enough money to buy a good wordpress webhost.After a googling i found a blogger is a best blogging software but many Pro blogger Like a Amit Agarwal choose a wordpress over a blogger.For starting a website using wordpress we want a good webhost and if you dont have enough money or trying to setup a just dummy or test wordpress website a free webhost is a good option.

entry.title: Vanilla Forums - Forum For Blogger Blog
entry.content:
Assalamualaikum,

Forum is essential part in any website to show a chit-chat with user or show presence in user side.In blogger many option available for using a software as a forum but vanilla is a best forum software available in market.vanilla forum generated a javascript for easily embedable in any page or post,Just copy java script and paste into your page.

Check Add Google Groups as Forum in Your Blogger Blog

Tutorial:

->In this tutorial i assume you hava a webhost,if not and want a free good webhost go to byethost.com Its a very good webhost i use it from 2010.Also Check My New Article Free WebHost For Your Blog.

1.Go to vanillaforums.org and download a stable release.

2.Upload it to your webhost and setup it.

3.Now login in your forum using admin account.

4.Go to Dashboard.

5.in Addon Sction Click On Plugins.

6.Now In Addon Section you see a new link <Embed> Vanilla Click on It and copy Forum Code.

code look like this,

7.Paste into your blogger static page or post.If you Not want a Side Bar then follow below step.

8.Go to Template Section.

9.Click on Edit HTML and Tick on Expand Widget Templates.

10.Copy a Static pages url and replace http://Yourdomain.com/p/forum.html with your static page url in below code line 1.

11.Place this code above </head>

entry.title: Add Css Color Chart In Blogger Blog
entry.content:
Assalamualaikum,

In Web designing color code is very important,So for this i share a 216 hexadecimal code with color shows.check below demo and after demo you find a code for impliment in your blogger or website.

Demo:

#FFFFFF #FFFFCC #FFFF99 #FFFF66 #FFFF33 #FFFF00
#FFCCFF #FFCCCC #FFCC99 #FFCC66 #FFCC33 #FFCC00
#FF99FF #FF99CC #FF9999 #FF9966 #FF9933 #FF9900
#FF66FF #FF66CC #FF6699 #FF6666 #FF6633 #FF6600
#FF33FF #FF33CC #FF3399 #FF3366 #FF3333 #FF3300
#FF00FF #FF00CC #FF0099 #FF0066 #FF0033 #FF0000

#CCFFFF #CCFFCC #CCFF99 #CCFF66 #CCFF33 #CCFF00

#CC99FF #CC99CC #CC9999 #CC9966 #CC9933 #CC9900

entry.title: Add Adsense Code Parser Or HTML Encoder In Your Blogger Blog
entry.content:
Assalamualaikum,

While writing tutorials or asking a question, sometimes it becomes very necessary to post html and javascript codes in your blog comment forms powered by Blogger. In order to help you to do that we will need to change/encode the same code into a text and then post it effectively without any error.In This Tutorial i show you how to add this tool in your blog.Check Working Demo Here

The Tool below will help you to change HTML characters to simple text, which could be easily inserted in your blogger template and comment form. You can also use it to convert your adsense code into an embeddable form. It converts special characters in this way,

  • '<' becomes '<'
  • '>' becomes '>'
  • '"' (double quote) becomes '"'
  • ''' (single quote) becomes '''
  • '&' becomes '&'

1.Create a Page

2.Paste Below Code in Your Page.

3.Change width: 590px and height: 200px with your Requirement.

4.Go to Blogger Dashbord.

5.Go to Template Section.

6.Click on Edit HTML and Tick on Expand Widget Templates.

7.Add below javascript code before </head>

8.Find ]]></b:skin> and add below css code above it

Check This Tutorial:

Add Google Groups as Forum in Your Blogger Blog

entry.content:
Assalamualaikum,

Forum for your site is great way to increasing a popularity of your website,but if you not afford any good webhost and free hosting creating trouble for you then simply insert google groups as your forum software.Many blogger like me is afford only a domain price and also want a forum for our blogger blog,so i choose a google groups as a forum software for Techelex Forum

Add It In Your Blog:

1.Go to https://groups.google.com/groups/create and fill details then click on Create my gruop

2.Add Some People in Groups and play with setting.

3.Go to group setting copy a java code which is provide for Embedding your group .Its look like below code,replace Your Group Name with your group name in below code line 9.

4.Create a Staic Page.

5.Paste This code in your blogger Static page.

6.Go to Blogger Dashbord.

7.Go to Template Section.

8.Click on Edit HTML and Tick on Expand Widget Templates.

9.Copy a Static pages url and replace http://Yourdomain.com/p/forum.html with your static page url in below code line 1.

10.Place this code above </head>

entry.title: Shortly-Serverless Pastebin
entry.content:
Assalamualaikum

After searching a pastebin like free service script which is run under my domain name but its difficult to setup any script which is available in public domain,because i have a free hosting which is allow only 50mb mysql database quota.I know its sufficient to my work but bandwidth and stability of free hosts is also matter.so after a googling continuosly i found a script which is run as a pastebin and main advantage is it is contain all data in url itself so if any one install this script then simply replace my domain name with own domain name and retrive a original data.

Script name is Shortly and in shortly no syntax highlighting is present,many services like a Hashify is present in market which is a many advantage over a Shortly like a syntax highlight and many other feature is present but i prefer Shortly over a hashify because its a simple in use.

Simply Clone Its Github repository and upload in new github repository in gh-pages branch.

Example: Full Article availe in url.
entry.summary:
Assalamualaikum

After searching a pastebin like free service script which is run under my domain name but its difficult to setup any script which is available in public domain,because i have a free hosting which is allow only 50mb mysql database quota.I know its sufficient to my work but bandwidth and stability of free hosts is also matter.

entry.title: Setup Octopress On Windows7
entry.content:
Assalamualaikum,

if you love static pages or not have enough money to buy a host to run a powerfull wordpress blog then Octopress is a best software for start blogging.Its very simple and clean but due to unfamiliar to run a running shell commands and basics of Git,its very difficult to setup a Octopress blog specially on a Windows7 machines.

This is quick guide to setting up Octopress on a Windows7 machine to publish to GitHub pages.

Before You Begin

1.Install Git.

2.Install Ruby Installer For windows.In this tutorial i use Ruby 1.9.3-p194

3.Install Development Kit.In this tutorial i use DevKit-tdm-32-4.5.2-20111229-1559-sfx.exe and extract files into C:/RubyDevKit.

4.create a folder in C drive like github

Setup Octopress

Follow this step

Next, install dependencies.

Install the default Octopress theme.

Deploying

In this tutorial use a github for blog publishing. Create a new Github repository and name the repository with your user name or organization name username.github.com or organization.github.com.

This will:

Ask you for your Github Pages repository url. Rename the remote pointing to imathis/octopress from origin to octopress

Add your Github Pages repository as the default origin remote.

Switch the active branch from master to source.

Configure your blog url according to your repository.

Setup a master branch in the _deploy directory for deployment.

Next run:

This will generate your blog, copy the generated files into _deploy/, add them to git, commit and push them up to the master branch. In a few seconds you should get an email from Github telling you that your commit has been received and will be published on your site.

Don’t forget to commit the source for your blog.

  • For configuration please see octopress default guide.
  • For creating post see Start blogging with Octopress

Note:Some text copy from Octopress website.
entry.summary:
Assalamualaikum,

if you love static pages or not have enough money to buy a host to run a powerfull wordpress blog then Octopress is a best software for start blogging.Its very simple and clean but due to unfamiliar to run a running shell commands and basics of Git,its very difficult to setup a Octopress blog specially on a Windows7 machines.

entry.title: Create Portable Application Using uniextract
entry.content:
Assalamualaikum,

This tutorial show you how to create a Portable Application using free utilty[Winrar,Universal Extractor 1.6.1]

Follow Some easy step and your portable app is ready for use.First Watch video and read steps,then you have any query or if you think any improvement then comment here.

Watch This Video

Follow This Steps:

1.Download [Winrar.exe And Universal Extractor 1.6.1.exe] from Filehippo or any other website

2.Install Both.

3.In This Tutorial we use qupzilla131.exe for creating Portable Application.

4.Right click on qupzilla131.exe and click on UniExtract here or UniExtract to Subdir.

5.Select all File present in subdir.Right click and "Add to archive"

6.Choose compression method is best and click on create sfx archive.

7.Click on Advanced tab.Then click on SFX options...

8.Click on Setup Tab and below Run after extraction paste the main program name.in this tutorial qupzilla.exe

9.Click on Modes Tab.Tick to Unpack to temporary folder.also click Hide all

10.Click on ok then ok.wait and watch your app is now portable but this method is not valid for all types......

Wish You Goodluck
entry.summary:
Assalamualaikum,

This tutorial show you how to create a Portable Application using free utilty[Winrar,Universal Extractor 1.6.1]

Follow Some easy step and your portable app is ready for use.First Watch video and read steps,then you have any query or if you think any improvement then comment here.

entry.title: Why I Select Octopress As Blogging Software
entry.content:
Assalamualaikum,

For a neat and lightweight bloggin,I tried some blogging software but no one full fill my need.i always think to blogging using a static file and because static software is always faster than dynamic bloging software.

After saw a Forum software which use a flat-file as a database myUpb.i continuously thinking about a static blogging software,after a googling i found a wordpress like blog which uses a flat-file as a database and also a free FlatPress.but in FlatPress comment plugin like a insertion of disqus is not easy and not configure in right way.after Flatpress i tried a Jekyll-Bootstrap as a blogging Software but i unable to understand it and unable to configure it[Because i am unfamiliar to Github].After a Jekyll-Bootstrap i tried a [[Octopress]] and i love it,its a simple in use but due to unfamiliar environment to ruby i learn to publish a blog using a Octopress + Windows7 in 15 days using a tutorial available in internet.
entry.summary:
Assalamualaikum,

For a neat and lightweight bloggin,I tried some blogging software but no one full fill my need.i always think to blogging using a static file and because static software is always faster than dynamic bloging software.

entry.title: First Post Using Github and Octopress
entry.content:
Assalamualaikum,

After a long work now i am finally able to setup and post using github + Octopress.I tried Jekyll Bootstrap,its nice but not fit in my need.i am not a tech guy but Octopress tag line A blogging framework for hackers always inspired me to write in hacker way.Thanks to all websites whose tutorials help me to setup a blog using Github+Octopress.

Now I am Thinking to create a tutorial for setting up a blog using Github+Octopress.i will be awaiting for your Comments.
